text:
Modus Create | Java Software Engineer | Remote | Full-Time Contract

Apply Here: http://bit.ly/2kTTdud

You will use Java and Spring Boot to analyze, code and deliver functionality for a microservices platform for our client in the Education / Career Preparatory space. At Modus Create you will collaborate daily on a cross functional, distributed SCRUM team to build better products. You can also email me directly kristen at moduscreate dot com Thank you!
